<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/55014</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>55014</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_460</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_460</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Progresiones</string>
            <string language="en">Progressions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weiterentwicklungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Progressions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Progressões</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progressioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόοδοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los conceptos de progresión aritmética y geométrica. Se estudian, en ambos casos, las fórmulas del término general y la de la suma de los n primeros términos de la progresión.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concepts of arithmetic and geometric progressions. The formulae of the general term and the sum of the first n terms of the progression are studied in both cases.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sucesión</string>
            <string language="en">sequence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geométrica</string>
            <string language="en">geometric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">progresión</string>
            <string language="en">progression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">término general</string>
            <string language="en">general term</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">aritmética</string>
            <string language="en">arithmetic</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Konzepte der arithmetischen und geometrischen 
Weiterentwicklungen zu erklären. Die Formeln der allgemeinen 
Bezeichnung und die Summe der ersten n Bezeichnungen der 
Weiterentwicklung werden in beiden Fällen studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer les concepts des progressions arithmétiques 
et géométriques. Les formules de la limite générale et la 
somme des premières limites de n de la progression sont étudiées 
dans les deux cas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
os conceitos de progressões aritméticas e geométricas. As 
fórmulas do termo geral e a soma dos primeiros termos de n da 
progressão são estudadas em ambos os casos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare i concetti delle progressioni aritmetiche e geometriche. 
Le formule del termine generale e la somma dei primi termini di 
n della progressione sono studiate in entrambi i casi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει τις έννοιες των αριθμητικών και γεωμετρικών 
προόδων. Οι τύποι του γενικού όρου και το ποσό των πρώτων 
όρων ν της προόδου μελετώνται και στις δύο περιπτώσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reihenfolge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geometrisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weiterentwicklung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">allgemeine Bezeichnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arithmetik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ordre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géométrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">progression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">limite générale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arithmétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">seqüência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
